description.value:
Special: Tearing

Note: Very Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement, may not be acquirable elsewhere. Come in and are equipped in pairs. When making an All-Out-Attack with this weapon, can spend reaction to make additional attack per 3 DoS on original WS Test.
